issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
install titanium 
-configure the android sdk and the titanium sdk using the titanium studio
-create new mobile app project 'alloy , deafult '
-then choose to debug using mobile browser 

h3. Actual Result
a message apear 'File /index.html not found'

h3. Expected Result
The app should show the content of the deafult project
fields.summary: my app doesnot build and keep showing an error message and when i use the browser to debug it this message apear 'File /index.html not found'
